item.title: üíå Reflections of a First-Year PhD Student
item.description: Doing a PhD was a decision that came naturally to me. I loved gaining more knowledge, and a PhD would give me all the time in the world (okay, about 4 years) to delve into topics that interest me. When I think about what it means to be ‚Äúsuccessful‚Äù, I think less about money and more about intellectual development. Also, a PhD was the logical next step in achieving what I had dreamed of since I was in second grade (I wanted to be a professor by day and a princess by night lol).
